Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Picornaviridae Infections/Enterovirus Infections/Coxsackievirus Infections
Record.Description: A heterogeneous group of infections produced by coxsackieviruses, including HERPANGINA, aseptic meningitis (MENINGITIS, ASEPTIC), a common-cold-like syndrome, a non-paralytic poliomyelitis-like syndrome, epidemic pleurodynia (PLEURODYNIA, EPIDEMIC) and a serious MYOCARDITIS.
